  • Lingua Sacra: in Three Parts

Download PDF View on Timeline
Title:
Lingua Sacra: in Three Parts
Author:
David Levi
Date Created:
1803
Description:
Lingua sacra: in three parts. Part I. contains a complete Hebrew grammar ... Part II. a complete Hebrew-English dictionary; containing all the words in the ... books of the Old Testament (being pure Hebrew); the Chaldee words in Daniel and Ezra; Targums of Onkelas, Jonathan, and Jerusalem; and such words in the Talmud, and writings of the most eminent rabbins, as serve to illustrate Scripture. Part III. to contain all words ... terms of art. and phrases used in the English tongue ...
Subjects:
Hebrew language--Grammar Hebrew language--Dictionaries--English English language--Dictionaries--Hebrew
Language:
English; Hebrew
Location:
London
Publisher:
London: E. Justins

Victorian Jewish Writers Project

Welcome to the Victorian Jewish Writers Project, a digital collection focusing on Anglo-Jewish writing during the long nineteenth century. The site is a work-in-progress, so please contact katzir [at] vjwp [dot] org if you need one-on-one assistance.
